title: ICSI Announces Capacity Building Series on Labour Laws & Related Compliances - Session 5
content:
# ICSI Announces Capacity Building Series on Labour Laws & Related Compliances - Session 5

Ek important update hai. The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) ne apni Capacity Building Series on Labour Laws & related Compliances ka Session 5 announce kiya hai, jo February 9, 2026 ko hone wala hai.

Yeh series members ke liye contemporary topics par knowledge updation aur skill enhancement ke liye ek naya initiative hai.

*   **Session:** Capacity Building Series on Labour Laws & related Compliances - Session 5
*   **Date & Time:** February 9, 2026, at 3:00 PM Onwards.
*   **Topic for Session 5:** The Occupational Safety, Health and Working Conditions Code, 2020 - II.
*   **Participation Fee:** ICSI Members ke liye koi participation fee nahi hai.
*   **Objective:** Is series ka aim hai members ko emerging Labour Laws scenario mein theoretical aur practical insights provide karna, jisse woh professional opportunities explore kar sakein.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://ecpl.live/icsi/labour/09022026/)

*Published on: 9 February 2026*
